Posts.Content: Hi penny I'm Aidan, I'm male and I'm 13 and i have recently in the shower today have found a breast lump in my left nipple. Now let me just assure you, you have more of a chance of winning the nasonal lottery which is Â£109,000,000 than your 5yr old son and evan a man under 25 getting breast cancer ( and i dont evan know if thats evan heard of) so don't worry about it and if yor not a science person: god would not take your son/one of his children for nothing your son has a lot to live for.
Posts.Title: Can a teen boy have breast cancer?
